subject: Thank you, we are ready to lend money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire THIS NIGHT):
 
$367,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest monthly payments!
 
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this plain form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
 
http://tslhqjectrum.com/
